options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
select 
  LEAST(started_at, finished_at) AS at,
  subject_id AS subject_id,
  extract('epoch' from (finished_at  - started_at)) AS run_duration,
  -- 
  last_payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' ->> 'url' AS url,
  outcome AS outcome
  FROM taskrun
  WHERE 
    taskrun.last_payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' ->> 'taskName' = '$taskName'
  ORDER BY at ASC
  LIMIT 10
;

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' ->> 'taskName' AS task
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE subject = 'taskrun'
list.label: Tasks
list.name: taskName
list.query:

FROM cdevents_lake
